sqlMap.statement: SELECT UPCODE,ELEMENTID,ELEMENTNAME FROM T10_SURVEYDEPLOY ORDER BY UPCODE,ELEMENTID

INSERT INTO T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT (PARTY_ID,CHECK_NO,UPCODE,ELEMENTID,ELEMENTNAME,ISTRUE,CONTEXT,CHECKUSER,CHECKDATE) VALUES (#party_id#,#check_no#,#upcode#,#elementid#,#elementname#,#istrue#,#context#,#checkuser#,#checkdate#)

INSERT INTO T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT_UH (PARTY_ID,CHECK_NO,UPCODE,ELEMENTID,ELEMENTNAME,ISTRUE,CONTEXT,CHECKUSER,CHECKDATE) SELECT PARTY_ID,CHECK_NO,UPCODE,ELEMENTID,ELEMENTNAME,ISTRUE,CONTEXT,CHECKUSER,CHECKDATE FROM T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
select count(*) from T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT where party_id=#value#
select PARTY_ID,CHECK_NO,UPCODE,ELEMENTID,ELEMENTNAME,ISTRUE,CONTEXT,CHECKUSER,CHECKDATE from T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT where party_id=#value#
delete from T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT where party_id=#value#

SELECT A.UPCODE,A.ELEMENTID,A.ELEMENTNAME,B.PARTY_ID,B.CHECK_NO,B.ISTRUE,B.CONTEXT,B.CHECKUSER,B.CHECKDATE FROM T10_SURVEYDEPLOY A LEFT JOIN
T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT B ON A.ELEMENTID = B.ELEMENTID AND B.PARTY_ID=#party_id# ORDER BY A.UPCODE,A.ELEMENTID
T10_SURVEYPARTY_TEXT_UH B ON A.ELEMENTID = B.ELEMENTID AND B.CHECK_NO=#check_no# ORDER BY A.UPCODE,A.ELEMENTID

SELECT A.PARTY_ID,A.PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.ORGANKEY,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.PARTY_ENG_NAME,A.COUNTRY_CD,A.CARD_TYPE,A.CARD_NO,B.CARD_END_DT,A.ADDR1,A.CELL_NO, A.AML1_TYPE_CD,B.OCCUPATION,B.DUTY,B.COMPANY,B.INDUSTRY,B.INDIV_INCOME,B.INCOME_ECNO,B.INCOME_SOURCE,B.CREATE_PURPOSE FROM T47_PARTY A,T47_INDIVIDUAL B WHERE A.PARTY_ID = B.PARTY_ID AND A.PARTY_ID = #value#

SELECT A.PARTY_ID,A.PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.ORGANKEY,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.COUNTRY_CD,A.CARD_TYPE AS CARD_TYPE_C,A.CARD_NO,B.INDUSTRYKEY AS INDUSTRY,A.AML2_TYPE_CD,B.MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE,A.AML1_TYPE_CD, B.MAIN_MANAGE_BUSINESS,B.ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD,B.ENROL_FUND_AMT,B.LEGAL_OBJ,B.LEGAL_CARD_TYPE,B.LEGAL_CARD_NO,B.LEGAL_CARD_NO_END_DT, B.STOCK_HOLDER,B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_TYPE,B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO,B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO_END_DT,B.ORG_CREDIT_NO,B.ORG_CREDIT_VT, B.LICENCE_END_DT FROM T47_PARTY A,T47_CORPORATION B WHERE A.PARTY_ID = B.PARTY_ID AND A.PARTY_ID = #value#
UPDATE T47_PARTY SET ORGANKEY=#organkey#,PARTY_CHN_NAME=#party_chn_name#,COUNTRY_CD=#country_cd#,CARD_TYPE=#card_type_c#,CARD_NO=#card_no# WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#

UPDATE T47_CORPORATION SET LEGAL_OBJ=#legal_obj#,LEGAL_CARD_TYPE=#legal_card_type#,LEGAL_CARD_NO=#legal_card_no#,LEGAL_CARD_NO_END_DT=#legal_card_no_end_dt#, STOCK_HOLDER=#stock_holder#,STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_TYPE=#stock_holder_card_type#,STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO=#stock_holder_card_no#,STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO_END_DT=#stock_holder_card_no_end_dt#, ORGAN_CODE=#organkey#,INDUSTRYKEY=#industry#,MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE=#main_manage_scope#,MAIN_MANAGE_BUSINESS=#main_manage_business#, ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD=#enrol_fund_currency_cd#,ENROL_FUND_AMT=#enrol_fund_amt#,ORG_CREDIT_NO=#org_credit_no#,ORG_CREDIT_VT=#org_credit_vt# ,LICENCE_END_DT=#licence_end_dt# WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#

UPDATE T47_PARTY SET PARTY_CHN_NAME=#party_chn_name#,PARTY_ENG_NAME=#party_eng_name#,COUNTRY_CD=#country_cd#,CARD_TYPE=#card_type#,CARD_NO=#card_no#, ADDR1=#addr1#,CELL_NO=#cell_no# WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#

UPDATE T47_INDIVIDUAL SET CARD_END_DT=#card_end_dt#,OCCUPATION=#occupation#,DUTY=#duty#,COMPANY=#company#,INDUSTRY=#industry#,INDIV_INCOME=#indiv_income#,INCOME_ECNO=#income_ecno#, INCOME_SOURCE=#income_source#,CREATE_PURPOSE=#create_purpose# WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#

INSERT INTO T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT (CHECK_NO,CHECK_TYPE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_CLASS_CD,CHECKER_ORG,ORGANKEY,CHECK_DT, VALID_DT, ADDWMENU_FLAG, ADDBMENU_FLAG, CHECK_EXPLAIN, CHECKER, CHECK_RESULT, CHECK_REASON,PARTY_CHN_NAME,CARD_TYPE,CARD_NO,AML1_TYPE_CD) VALUES (#check_no#,#check_type#,#party_id#,#party_class_cd#,#check_org#,#organkey#,#check_dt#,#valid_dt#,#addwmenu_flag#,#addbmenu_flag#,#check_explain#,#checker#,#check_result#,#check_reason#,#party_chn_name#,#card_type#,#card_no#,#aml1_type_cd#)
UPDATE T10_CHECKPARTY_NEW SET CHECK_STATUS=1 WHERE PARTY_ID = #value#
UPDATE T10_CHECKPARTY_RE SET CHECK_STATUS=1 WHERE PARTY_ID = #value#

INSERT INTO T10_CHECKPARTY_UH (PARTY_ID,CHECK_NO,PARTY_CLASS_CD,PARTY_CHN_NAME,CARD_TYPE,CARD_NO,ORGANKEY,CHECK_DT,VALID_DT,CHECK_RESULT,CHECKER,CHECK_TYPE) VALUES (#party_id#,#check_no#,#party_class_cd#,#party_chn_name#,#card_type#,#card_no#,#organkey#,#check_dt#,#valid_dt#,#check_result#,#checker#,#check_type#)

INSERT INTO T10_CHECKPARTY_NEW (PARTY_ID,HOST_CUST_ID,PARTY_CLASS_CD,PARTY_CHN_NAME,CARD_TYPE,CARD_NO,ORGANKEY,CREATE_DT,PARTY_STATUS_CD,AML1_TYPE_CD,CHECK_STATUS VALUES (#party_id#,#host_cust_id#,#party_class_cd#,#party_chn_name#,#card_type#,#card_no#,#organkey#,#create_dt#,#party_status_cd#,#aml1_type_cd#,#check_status#)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_NEW WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_RE WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#

INSERT INTO T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT_UH (CHECK_NO,CHECK_TYPE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_CLASS_CD,CHECKER_ORG,CHECK_DT,VALID_DT,ADDWMENU_FLAG,ADDBMENU_FLAG,CHECK_EXPLAIN,CHECKER,CHECK_RESULT,CHECK_REASON,PARTY_CHN_NAME,CARD_TYPE,CARD_NO) SELECT CHECK_NO,CHECK_TYPE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_CLASS_CD,CHECKER_ORG,CHECK_DT,VALID_DT,ADDWMENU_FLAG,ADDBMENU_FLAG,CHECK_EXPLAIN,CHECKER,CHECK_RESULT,CHECK_REASON,PARTY_CHN_NAME,CARD_TYPE,CARD_NO FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
DELETE FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#

SELECT A.PARTY_ID,A.CHECK_NO,A.CHECK_EXPLAIN,A.CHECKER,A.CHECK_DT,A.VALID_DT,A.CHECK_RESULT FROM
T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT A WHERE A.PARTY_ID=#party_id#
T10_CHECKPARTY_RELT_UH A WHERE A.CHECK_NO=#check_no#
SELECT CHECK_REASON FROM T10_CHECKPARTY_RE WHERE PARTY_ID = #value# AND CHECK_STATUS = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_WHITELIST_INFO WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_BLACKLIST WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
SELECT PARTY_ID,REASON_CREATE,RULE_TYPE FROM T07_WHITELIST_INFO WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
SELECT PARTY_ID,REASON_CREATE AS B_REASON_CREATE,LIST_TYPE FROM T07_BLACKLIST WHERE PARTY_ID=#value#
